articles.title: Morahan, Beale come into play as Wallabies fullback options thin - Sydney Morning Herald
articles.description: Australia’s outside back options are dropping like flies. What are the options available to Dave Rennie ahead of a defining European tour?
articles.content:
The Wallabies will wait until they arrive in the United Kingdom to make a call on their fullback options after injury all but ended Reece Hodges tour.
